item.title: Performance Analysis and Optimization of the Weather Forecasting Model
item.description: (2 hours) Background (5 mins) Scalability Analysis Need graphs MPI collectives (+2 hours) New MPI 3 : Check only non-blocking collectives : WRF init : MPI_Ibcast MPI_Iallreduce Compiler Optimizations Brief compiler flag opts check –> Hybrid Parallelism What why Perf Report ? ; NO
